name: C.A.R - (Carefully Avoiding Roadblocks)
description:
C.A.R (Carefully Avoiding Roadblocks) is a 2.5D side scroller developed in 2020 for the createChester game jam run by the university of chester created by the team UFF (Unique Feature Freaks). The theme of the game jam was “One Mechanic”, and the game C.A.R is the result of said game jam made in 3 days made by 7 people.

C.A.R is set in a variety of different environments in which the player is in control of the speed of the car driving along the road avoiding obstacles and basically trying not to die in a burning car wreck at the bottom of a cliff... 
The obstacles you encounter while driving depend on the environment you are currently in, every level throws something unique at you, remember, everything is out to get you so avoid it at any cost. Pretty rough day for a ride huh? 
Your mission? Reach your destination and survive!

Avoid the falling objects, make sure you're moving fast when faced with obsticles in the road.

Controls:

A to move left

D to move right

Requires:

Windows PC

Credits (UFF team members) :

Aria Charlton (L4) = Programming, Game design
Szymon Sroka (L4)= UI design
Thanawat Tianchanthuek (L4) = Programming
Jake Preece (L5) = 3D art, Programming, Game design
Michael Koller (L5) = 3D art, Game design
Petter Sovik (L6) = 3D art, Game design, Programming, pretty much anything you can think of
Connor McGurk (L6) = 3D art, Game design, Level design
